artist_names: ¥$, Kanye West & Ty Dolla $ign (Ft. Chris Brown)
full_title: BEG FORGIVENESS by ¥$, Kanye West & Ty Dolla $ign (Ft. Chris Brown)
title: BEG FORGIVENESS

description.plain:
Track 13 on the Vultures 1 collab album. Was first previewed in a restaurant in Miami on December 10, 2023. The track was performed in full by Ye, Ty and Chris Brown on December 12, 2023, at the “Vultures Rave” in Miami.

“Beg Forgiveness” is a cover of the song “Gabriel” by Joe Goddard and Valentina Pappalardo, with one of the only changes to the lyrics being the removal of the name Gabriel.

body.plain:
Track 13 on the Vultures 1 collab album. Was first previewed in a restaurant in Miami on December 10, 2023. The track was performed in full by Ye, Ty and Chris Brown on December 12, 2023, at the “Vultures Rave” in Miami.

“Beg Forgiveness” is a cover of the song “Gabriel” by Joe Goddard and Valentina Pappalardo, with one of the only changes to the lyrics being the removal of the name Gabriel.
